TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed GCCollectionMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the behavior for a forced garbage collection.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the <xref:System.GC.Collect%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method overload to specify the GCCollectionMode value.
## Examples The following example forces a garbage collection for generation 2 objects with the Optimized setting.
[!code-vb[System.GC.GCCollectionMode#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.gccollectionmode_1.vb)] [!code-cs[System.GC.GCCollectionMode#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.gccollectionmode_1.cs)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.GCCollectionMode Default = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The default setting for this enumeration, which is currently Forced.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.GCCollectionMode Forced = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Forces the garbage collection to occur immediately.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.GCCollectionMode Optimized = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Allows the garbage collector to determine whether the current time is optimal to reclaim objects.
